<div class="post" id="post-89081">
<div class="postHeader">
	<div class="title">
		<h2><a href="https://www.pizzicato.lu/festival-daix-en-provence-wins-birgit-nilsson-prize-2025/" rel="bookmark" title="Permanent Link to Festival d’Aix-en-Provence wins Birgit Nilsson Prize 2025">Festival d’Aix-en-Provence wins Birgit Nilsson Prize 2025</a></h2>
	</div>
	<div class="postmeta">
		<span class="pmet">
			21/05/2025 
		</span>
	</div>	
			<div class="clear"></div>	
</div>
	<div class="entry">
						<p>The Birgit Nilsson Prize – the world’s largest prize in classical music at 1 million US dollars – honours the Festival d’Aix-en-Provence for outstanding artistic achievements, giving special recognition to the 2021 premiere of Kaija Saariaho’s Opera Innocence.  It is the first festival to receive the Prize, to be presented on October 21 by His Majesty King Carl XVI Gustaf at Konserthuset Stockholm.  <a href="https://www.pizzicato.lu/festival-daix-en-provence-wins-birgit-nilsson-prize-2025/" class="more-link">Read More →</a></p>
		<div class="clear"></div>
	</div>
</div>


<div class="post" id="post-89084">
<div class="postHeader">
	<div class="title">
		<h2><a href="https://www.pizzicato.lu/dresdner-musikfestspiele-2025-glanzvoll-eroffnet/" rel="bookmark" title="Permanent Link to Dresdner Musikfestspiele 2025 glanzvoll eröffnet">Dresdner Musikfestspiele 2025 glanzvoll eröffnet</a></h2>
	</div>
	<div class="postmeta">
		<span class="pmet">
			21/05/2025 
		</span>
	</div>	
			<div class="clear"></div>	
</div>
	<div class="entry">
							
				<div class="wp-caption alignleft" style="width: 170px">
				<a href="https://www.pizzicato.lu/dresdner-musikfestspiele-2025-glanzvoll-eroffnet/"><img class="size-full wp-image-180 " src="https://www.pizzicato.lu/wp-content/themes/Pizzicato/timthumb.php?src=https://www.pizzicato.lu/wp-content/uploads/2023/09/Saechsische_Staatskapelle_Dresden_Christian_Thielemann__c__Matthias_Creutziger.jpg&w=160&q=100&zc=1" alt="">
			</a><p>Staatskapelle Dresden<br>
(c) Matthias Creutzinger</p>
</div>
				<p>Sachsen ist ein wirkliches Kulturland. Neben seinen Kunstschätzen feiert hier die Musik immer wieder Hoch-Zeiten. Nur zwei Tage nach dem Auftakt des großen Shostakovich Festivals in Leipzig begannen in Dresden die Musikfestspiele 2025. Michael Oehme berichtet. <a href="https://www.pizzicato.lu/dresdner-musikfestspiele-2025-glanzvoll-eroffnet/" class="more-link">Read More →</a></p>
		<div class="clear"></div>
	</div>
</div>


<div class="post" id="post-89078">

			</a><p>King Donald I of America</p>
</div>
				<p>A dictator and fascist like Trump needs stupid people to adore him. That’s why museum funding and programming in the United States have experienced an unprecedented assault in the first 100 days of Trump’s term. National museums got caught up in his hunt against programs to ensure diversity, equity, inclusion and access programs (DEIA), he called « illegal and immoral » in an executive order. Both the National Gallery of Art in Washington, D.C., and the Smithsonian Institution, a nationwide network of museums, eliminated their DEIA offices within a week. <a href="https://www.pizzicato.lu/assault-on-culture-has-a-reason-trump-needs-stupid-uneducated-americans-to-follow-him-loyally/" class="more-link">Read More →</a></p>
